title: 2.1 Simulating Forces: Gravity and Wind
description: In this video I introduce Newton's Laws of Motion, and apply the concept of a "force" to a p5.js sketch with a mover object and two forces: gravity and wind.

timestamps.title: Check to see if Newton's Second Law is at play
May the force be with you!
